data.title: Catholic High School Admission Information
data.text:
The Catholic High School Entrance Exam is typically administered on the first Saturday in December each year. The 2024 exam will take place on Saturday, December 7. We recommend consulting directly with the Catholic high school where the student intends to enroll for the 2025/26 school year. Check back in the fall for more information.

Below is a list of our Catholic high schools, including links to their admission information and summer program information for rising grades 5-8. Fall open houses and shadow day information can also be found on the individual school websites, once available for the fall of 2024.
